DOC.brief_title: Light Protection TPN Oxidative Stress Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective single blind randomize control trial . Inborn preterm infant less 32 wks gestational age , receive TPN neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) Mansoura University Children 's Hospital part care include . Preterm infant randomly divide 2group : - Group 1 include preterm infant receive TPN bag tube system protect light aluminum foil . Group 2 include preterm infant receive TPN bag tube system expose light . Randomization do use random table technique opaque seal envelope contain serial number group subject enrol . These envelope keep unit ready use time ; one number serial number baby group TPN baby enrol . The urine sample send laboratory serial number information group study sample follow peroxide level well blood sample GSH\GSSG . Two blood sample two urine sample collect . The first one 0 hour start TPN regimen base line second 7 day start TPN regimen . Blood sample least 1cc blood GSH/GSSG assay . Urine collection bag place infant obtain minimum 1cc urine urinary peroxide level assay . Other secondary outcome assess duration NICU admission include death /or bronchopulmonary dysplasia preterm infant time hospital discharge , necrotizing enterocolitis ( NEC ) , sepsis positive blood culture , length hospital stay , retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) , time full enteral feeding , duration respiratory support , liver function , cholestasis define elevated serum conjugate bilirubin > 2 mg/dL , metabolic response .
